Posts.EditableText: Ok so maybe I'm an idiot but I can't figure phone gap out. I have the phone and windows versions downloaded but I can not do anything with the desktop version. What am I supposed to do for local path? Every tutorial I've seen skips this. I have my squiffy file on my desktop but I cant access it through phone gap. Someone help this idiot please.
